Name: Domain of application
Description: inflectional or derivational morphology, compounding, or special onymic markers (= name markers) (Handschuh 2019: ยง3.1.1)

Name: Boundness of name gender markers
Description: bound marker, free form, or phonological pattern (Handschuh 2019: ยง3.1.2)

Name: Transparency of name gender markers
Description: opaque, partly transparent, or fully transparent  (Handschuh 2019: ยง3.1.3)

Name: Symmetry of marking
Description: asymmetric or symmetric marking of sex-specific forms of given names (Handschuh 2019: ยง3.1.4)
